Reviews.Title: “Out-dated hotel - Destroy and Rebuild”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 5 times february march 7 spend 9 nights loved located 5 minutes miami intl airport arrived morning kevin front desk invited breakfast wonderful 930 am available pleased size clean comfortable reservation beginning april highly recommend hotel ja nos hotel 4 ou 5 la por final de ate dia 703 deste ano bem os chekin das kevin da nos cafe da que nos uma suite da este hotel da para todos os cafe da com wafer bagel muffin etc
